description: <strong>Title Senior .Net / SQL Server Developer</strong><p><br></p><strong>Job Type Contract to Hire</strong><p><br></p><strong>Location - East Chicago, IN 46312</strong><p><br></p><strong>Description:</strong><p><br></p>Client is seeking a Microsoft .NET Developer in the information technology department. As a Microsoft .NET Developer, you will be part of a team providing development and support for the Commercial Business order management systems production environment with a focus area that includes sales order initialization, legacy order entry, and metric reporting but can cover any of the order management areas. Daily activities will include participation and lead in the design, development, testing, and implementation of changes to web, windows (batch) applications. Experience in the entire systems development life cycle will be required as you will be working directly with business departments for requirements gathering and will create their own functional and technical specs and then continue with development, testing, implementation, and support.<p><br></p><strong>Responsibilities: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Gather detailed business requirements to deliver changes from the business user groups.</li><li>Design, develop, test, &amp; implement changes to Commercial Web and Windows applications. </li><li>Be the technical expert to manage the production environment for the Commercial systems.</li><li>Coordinate ongoing communication and support with business users.</li><li>Responsible for application design by having a good end to end knowledge of the business process and how the legacy applications fit together.</li><li>Ensure all production documentation is up to date including functional specifications and test cases.</li><li>Ensure all new developments conform to standards.</li><li>Project management including the ability to manage own work.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Minimum Requirements: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>BS in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent</li><li>8+ years of experience developing Web and Windows Applications and Services including HTML5, CSS (Bootstrap), AJAX, Dependency Injection, and JavaScript.</li><li>8+ years of experience in the Microsoft Development stack: ASP.NET Core 6, ASP.net Core Identity Security, MVC, C#, Entity Framework, LINQ, jQuery, Blazor Server, Asynchronous Programming.</li><li>Excellent SQL Server skills including experience with current versions of SQL Server and a deep understanding of T-SQL, complex Joins, Stored Procedures, and Triggers.</li><li>Experience and understanding of the full SDLC including gathering business requirements, designing solutions, and working with stakeholders to test and implement the solutions you build.</li><li>Experience working on large enterprise applications. </li><li>Ability to work independently.</li><li>Participation in at least three enterprise development projects</li><li>O365 Microsoft tools</li><li>Strong verbal and written communication skills</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Preferred Requirements: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Master's Degree in Engineering, Business Management or Equivalent</li><li>Microsoft Certification (Developer or Solution Architect) with 10+ years of web/windows development experience</li><li>Experience with Microsoft .Net Architecture design in an enterprise organization.</li><li>Experience with Microsoft Azure, Synapse and/or Dev Ops.</li><li>Manufacturing experience</li><li>SAP S/4 HANA (1709 or higher) experience</li></ul> Senior .Net SQL Server Developer

title: Java Developer
description: Net<strong> 2 </strong>Source Inc. is an award-winning total workforce solutions company recognized by Staffing Industry Analysts for our accelerated growth of 300% in the last 3 years with over 5500+ employees globally, with over 30+ locations in the US and global operations in 32 countries. We believe in providing staffing solutions to address the current talent gap Right Talent Right Time Right Place Right Price and acting as a Career Coach to our consultants.<p><br></p><strong> Full Stack Engineer</strong><p><br></p><strong> 100% Remote</strong><p><br></p><strong> 6 Months contract to hire</strong><p><br></p><strong> Rate: $60-$65/hr C2C, $55-$60/hr W2</strong><p><br></p><strong> Must Haves: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li> 8+ years of overall IT experience</li><li> 2+ years of experience with Angular 8+ </li><li> 4+ years of experience implementing REST services with Java, preferably including Spring Boot </li><li> Some experience in deploying to a cloud platform (Kubernetes, PCF, Google Cloud Platform, Azure, AWS, etc.) </li><li> Some experience with TDD, in both frontend and backend technologies </li><li> Good written and verbal communication skills </li><li> Some experience with agile methodology and pair programming (XP, Scrum, etc.) - candidate must be willing to pair program </li><li> Familiar with CI/CD tools (e.g. Jenkins) </li><li> Familiar with maintaining and interacting with databases (Oracle, PostGres, etc.) </li><li> Capacity to lead a feature track </li><li> Familiar with software release management tools (Pivotal Tracker, JIRA, Rally, etc.) </li><li> Capability to mentor junior and mid-level engineer resources </li></ul><p><br></p><strong> Why work with us - </strong> At Net2Source, we believe everyone has an opportunity to lead. We see the importance of your perspective and your ability to create value. We want you to fit inwith an inclusive culture, focus on work-life fit and well-being, and a supportive, connected environment; but we also want you to stand outwith opportunities to have a strategic impact, innovate, and take necessary steps to make your mark. We help clients with new skilling, talent strategy, leadership development, employee experience, transformational change management and beyond.<p><br></p><strong> Equal Employment Opportunity Statement: </strong><p><br></p>Net2Source is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative, more competitive, and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.<p><br></p><strong> Awards and Accolades: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li> America's Most Honored Businesses (Top 10%) </li><li> Awarded by USPAAC for Fastest Growing Business in the US </li><li> 12th Fastest Growing Staffing Company in USA by Staffing industry Analysts in the US (2020, 2019, 2020) </li><li> Fastest 50 by NJ Biz (2020, 2019, 2020) </li><li> INC 5000 Fastest growing for 8 consecutive years in a row (only 1.26% companies make it to this list) </li><li> Top 100 by Dallas Business Journal (2020 and 2019) </li><li> Proven Supplier of the Year by Workforce Logiq (2020 and 2019) </li><li> 2019 Spirit of Alliance Award by Agile1 </li><li> 2018 Best of the Best Platinum Award by Agile1 </li><li> 2018 TechServe Alliance Excellence Awards Winner </li><li> 2017 Best of the Best Gold Award by Agile1(Act1 Group) </li></ul><p><br></p>Thanks,<p><br></p>Kuldeep Yadav<p><br></p>Team Lead<p><br></p>Ext.452<p><br></p>Address: 270 Davidson Ave Suite 704, Somerset, NJ, 08873<p><br></p>Website:
